authScene.claimText: Stump服务器尚未初始化。请使用下面的表单创建您的帐户。之后就能够完全访问服务器所有功能。

libraryConfiguration.heading: 媒体库配置
libraryConfiguration.subtitleCreating: 您的新书库预览将在下面显示
libraryConfiguration.subtitleEditing: 您书库编辑的预览将在下方显示

createBookClubScene.heading: 创建一个新的读书俱乐部
createBookClubScene.subtitle: 您可以创建一个私人读书俱乐部，或者创建一个公开的任何人都可以加入的读书俱乐部

description.label: 描述
description.placeholder: An 'Our Flag Means Death' fan club. We read pirate fiction to our hearts content
description.description: 您的读书俱乐部的简短描述（可选）

is_private.label: 私人俱乐部
is_private.description: 如果启用，只有您邀请的用户才能够加入您的读书俱乐部

member_role_spec.heading: 自定义角色映射
subtitle: 如果您喜欢，您可以在读书俱乐部创建自定义角色名称。欲了解更多信息，请参阅
文档

member.label: 成员
member.description: 您的读书俱乐部默认角色的名称

moderator.label: 版主
moderator.description: 您的读书俱乐部版主的名称

admin.label: 管理员
admin.description: 您的读书俱乐部管理员角色的名称

creator.label: 创建者
creator.description: 您的读书俱乐部创建者角色的名称。就您！

creator_preferences.heading: 成员
creator_preferences.subtitle: 您自己在书俱乐部中的会员设置

creator_display_name.label: 显示名
creator_display_name.description: 您在读书俱乐部的会员可选显示名称。如果设置，它优先于您的用户名

creator_hide_progress.label: 隐藏进度
creator_hide_progress.description: 如果启用，您的阅读进度将对读书俱乐部的其他成员隐藏

createLibraryScene.heading: 创建库
createLibraryScene.subtitle: Libraries are used to group your books together. If you're wanting a refresh on how they work, check out the

labels.libraryPathDescription: 您服务器上的书库路径

librarySettingsScene.subtitle: 在此管理您的书库。如果您想要更新这些设置，请查看

labels.libraryPathDescription: 您服务器上的书库路径

emptyState.heading: 没有书可以显示
emptyState.message: 您正在阅读的任何书都会显示在这里

emptyState.heading: 没有要显示的系列
emptyState.message: 您添加到书库的任何系列都会在此显示

emptyState.heading: 没有书可以显示
emptyState.message: 您添加到书库中的任何系列都会在此处显示

userSmartListsScene.heading: 智能清单
userSmartListsScene.subtitle: 保存您喜欢的搜索和过滤器以便于访问

emptyState.heading: 没有要显示的智能列表

emptyState.noMatchesMessage: 尝试更改您的搜索参数

layout.missingIdError: 此场景需要 URL 中的 ID

filterDrawer.heading: 智能列表筛选器

description.create: 为此智能列表创建新视图

name.label: 名称

name.label: 名称
name.description: 此视图的更新名称（如果需要）

app/account.title: 账户设置
app/account.description: 与您的帐户相关的设置

validation.invalidUrl: 请输入有效的 URL 地址

errors.updateFailed: 更新您的个人资料时服务器发生错误。请重试。

avatarPicker.heading: 设置您的头像
avatarPicker.subtitle: Stump 支持自定义头像，头像可以通过提供图片的 URL 来设置。 为减少服务器上存储的数据，不支持图像上传。
avatarPicker.preview: 当您输入了一个URL，预览将会在这里显示。

locale.heading: Language and locale
subtitle: Stump supports multiple languages and locales, set your preferences below. Please consider helping improve the quality of
Stump's translations
if you're able to!

app/appearance.title: 外观
app/appearance.description: 自定义应用程序的外观和感觉效果

themeSelect.label: 主题
themeSelect.description: By default, Stump has a light and dark theme
customTheme: If you're interested in creating your own custom theme, check out the

app/reader.title: Reader settings
app/reader.description: Default options for the Stump readers. These are bound to your current device only

imageBasedBooks.label: Image-based books
imageBasedBooks.description: Comic books, manga, and other image-based books

preloadAheadCount.label: Preload ahead count
preloadAheadCount.description: The number of pages to preload ahead of the current page

preloadBehindCount.label: Preload behind count
preloadBehindCount.description: The number of pages to preload behind the current page

app/desktop.title: 桌面设置
app/desktop.description: Settings related to the Stump desktop application

discordPresence.label: Discord Presence
discordPresence.description: Display your Stump activity in Discord using Discord Rich Presence

server/general.title: 常规设置
server/general.description: General settings related to your Stump server instance

updateAvailable.message: Your server is not up to date. Please update to the latest version!

serverInfo.title: 服务器信息
serverInfo.description: Basic details about your Stump server instance

build.label: 构建
build.description: 关于版本和构建的细节

server/logs.title: 日志
server/logs.description: The logs generated by your Stump server instance

persistedLogs.title: Persisted logs
persistedLogs.description: These logs have been manually persisted to the database, typically associated with a specific job or event

table.emptySubtitle: 您的服务器非常健康或很不健康

liveLogs.title: 实时日志
liveLogs.description: Streamed directly from your Stump server instance in real-time

server/jobs.title: 任务
server/jobs.description: Background jobs that run on your Stump server instance

scheduling.title: Scheduling
scheduling.description: Some jobs can be configured to run on a schedule. Changes to this configuration will take effect after a server restart

history.title: History
history.description: A record of jobs that have been run on your Stump server instance

table.emptyHeading: There are no jobs to display
table.emptySubtitle: You can't have a job if you don't have a job
table.deleteAllMessage: Job history and statistics may be deleted from the database at any time. This action cannot be undone

server/users.title: 用户
server/users.description: 管理此服务器上的用户

createUser.title: 创建用户
createUser.description: 在此服务器上创建新用户

updateUser.title: 更新用户
updateUser.description: 更新此用户的详细信息

accessControl.heading: 访问控制和限制
subtitle: 配置您想要对此用户应用的任何限制。欲了解更多有关访问控制的信息，请参阅
文档

ageRestriction.label: 年龄限制
ageRestriction.description: 限制用户访问设定年龄分级阈值以上的内容

enforceUnset.label: 在未设置时生效
enforceUnset.description: 如果启用此选项，用户将被限制访问没有年龄评级的内容

tagRestriction.label: 标签限制
tagRestriction.description: 限制用户访问选中标签的内容

permissions.heading: 权限
subtitle: 选择您想要授予此用户的权限。欲了解更多关于每个权限的信息，请查看
文档

read.label: 读书俱乐部功能访问
read.description: 允许用户访问读书俱乐部功能，包括查看和加入读书俱乐部

create.label: 创建读书俱乐部
create.description: 允许用户创建新的读书俱乐部

explorer.label: 文件浏览器
explorer.description: 允许用户访问各种文件浏览器。若启用此功能则无法保证内容限制。

download.label: 下载文件
download.description: 允许用户从服务器下载文件

upload.label: 上传文件
upload.description: 允许用户上传文件到服务器

create.label: 新建书库
create.description:
允许用户创建新的书库。
包括扫描和编辑的权限

scan.label: 扫描书库
scan.description: 允许用户对现有书库启动扫描

edit.label: 编辑书库
edit.description: 允许用户编辑现有书库的基本信息

manage.label: 管理书库
manage.description:
允许用户管理现有书库的高级设置。
包括扫描和编辑的权限

delete.label: 删除书库
delete.description:
允许用户删除现有的书库。
包括扫描、管理和编辑的权限

manage.label: Manage server
manage.description:
Allows the user to manage the server.
Includes *many* other permissions

read.label: Read users
read.description: Allows the user to query other users on the server. This is required for some other features, e.g. excluding users from accessing a library

manage.label: Manage users
manage.description:
Allows the user to manage other users on the server.
Includes permissions to read, create, and update

read.label: Access smart list feature
read.description:
Allows the user to access smart lists features. Granular permissions are not yet implemented, so this
includes permissions to read, create, and update their own lists

validation.ageRestrictionTooLow: Age restriction cannot be less than 0

serverSOS.heading: 服务器不可用

desktop.message:
A network error occurred that suggests your Stump server is currently unavailable. Please ensure that it is running and accessible from this device.
If your server URL has changed, you can update it using the form below

web.message: A network error occurred that suggests your Stump server is currently unavailable. Please ensure that it is running and accessible from this device

serverSOS.reconnected: 重连到服务器！正在重定向...

uploadImage.emptyState: A preview of your image will appear here
uploadImage.prompt: Drop image here or click to select

common.unimplemented: 此功能尚未实现！稍后再试
common.limitedFunctionality: 这尚未完全实现，并且缺少一些功能。请稍后再试
